1.content: Check the E.G.O your Sinners have equipped and their required resources to form a team of Identities that can efficiently gather them in battle.

2.content: E.G.O can shift the battle in your favor if used when your Sinners have enough Sanity.

3.content: When an enemy runs out of Sanity and falls into Panic, they’ll suffer negative effects, giving you an advantage.

4.content: If a Staggered character’s health falls below the next Stagger Threshold, they’ll take extra damage.
